item.title: How to Explain Floaters to Someone Who Doesn’t Get It
item.description:
You try to explain what’s bothering you.
You say something like:

“There’s this thing in my vision. Like a shadow, or speck, that follows me…”

And the other person shrugs.

“Sounds annoying. But it’s probably nothing, right?”

You feel dismissed. Misunderstood.
And maybe even a little crazy for caring so much.

If you’ve ever asked, “How do I explain floaters to someone who doesn’t get it?”, this post is for you.
